channel.title: Everytime I try to attack a npc I disconnect instantly. [317]
channel.description:
Okay, title says it all. What file would/could be causing this? I post my code for those files so y'all can try to help me out.
Thanks in advance,
Nick[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 23, 2009, 08:32:16 pm[/size][hr]Edit: Every time I try to attack ANYTHING I disconnect.
